thread.title: S.F. teachers get help living in city under ambitious plan
thread.title_full: S.F. teachers get help living in city under ambitious plan - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Emily Green
title: S.F. teachers get help living in city under ambitious plan
text:
Photo: Leah Millis, The Chronicle Elementary school teachers Jessica Chiarchiaro (left) and Allison Leshefsky say they have been priced out of San Francisco’s expensive housing market. Elementary school teachers Jessica Chiarchiaro (left) and Allison...
Mayor Ed Lee and the San Francisco Unified School District announced Wednesday they plan to build a 100-unit housing complex solely for public school teachers and paraprofessionals, and invest up to $44 million over the next five years to help them purchase homes. Elementary school teachers Jessica Chiarchiaro (left) and Allison Leshefsky say they have been priced out of San Francisco’s expensive housing market. Elementary school teachers Jessica Chiarchiaro (left) and Allison...
Mayor Ed Lee and the San Francisco Unified School District announced Wednesday they plan to build a 100-unit housing complex solely for public school teachers and paraprofessionals, and invest up to $44 million over the next five years to help them purchase homes.
